#### Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites interested parties to submit information regarding their capabilities in Business Data Analytics and Subscriptions and Business Benchmarking Services.

#### Background

The PSPC is seeking information from businesses that can provide:

* Business data analytics
* Subscriptions to business data
* Business benchmarking services

#### Scope

The request for information (RFI) is for a selective tendering process. The successful respondent will be selected based on their ability to meet the PSPC's requirements.

#### Requirements

The PSPC is looking for a service provider that can:

* Provide business data analytics and subscriptions
* Offer business benchmarking services
* Meet the PSPC's requirements

#### Eligibility Criteria

To be eligible, respondents must meet the following criteria:

* Be a business or organization with the necessary expertise and capabilities to provide the services required by the PSPC

#### Preferences

The PSPC has included the following trade agreements as preferences (no specific details have been provided):

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* None
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contact Information

Those interested in responding should contact Tara Egan (SPAC/PSPC) at tara.egan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Notice of Intent to Respond
Respondents are strongly encouraged to submit a notice of intent to respond to the RFI.
